privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.welcome: Welcome to Loyalty Vault. We highly value your privacy. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.
privacyPolicy.section1Text:
We collect the following data only when the user grants the necessary permissions:

Camera: Used to allow the user to take photos, mainly for scanning loyalty cards. The photos taken are not transmitted to any server and remain stored locally on the device.
privacyPolicy.section2Text: Your data is used solely for app functionalities and is never shared with third parties.
privacyPolicy.section3Text: All data, including photos taken with the camera, is stored locally on your device. No information is sent to external servers.
privacyPolicy.section4Text: You can revoke access to the camera at any time through your device settings.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: These Terms of Use (“Terms”) govern the use of the mobile application Loyalty Vault (hereinafter “the App”). By downloading or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms without reservation.
terms.section1Text: Loyalty Vault allows users to save and view their loyalty cards digitally, directly on their mobile device, including offline.
terms.section2Text: The App is available for free on official app stores (Google Play, App Store). No account is required to use it. Access may be temporarily suspended for maintenance, updates, or technical issues.
terms.section3Text: Loyalty Vault does not collect or transmit any data to external servers. All information (photos, cards, preferences) is stored locally on your device. The App may request access to features (like the camera) only with your permission. A full privacy policy is available within the app settings.
terms.section4Text: All elements of the App (name, logo, interface, texts) are protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use or reproduction is strictly prohibited.
terms.section5Text: The app’s publisher cannot be held responsible for the loss of locally stored data. The user is responsible for the proper use of the App and the management of their data.
terms.section6Text: The user can delete all stored data at any time through the designated option in the app settings.
terms.section7Text: These Terms may be modified at any time. Users will be notified of updates via the App.
terms.section8Text: For any questions or feedback, contact us at : pygmalion.digitals@gmail.com
